pages.text: Electrical appliances can only be operated if they are in the power grid and the power generated by the grid is not less than the power consumed.
The $(item)Heater$()'s power consumption is 8MW. It heats the block above and allows the anvil to perform smelting operations.

The $(item)Auto Crafter$()'s power consumption is 1MW. It's an enhanced version of the vanilla crafter, with filtering options. It works 64 times every 1 second when receiving a continuous redstone signal.

The $(item)Power Converter$()'s power consumption is 1MW, 3MW and 9MW respectively accroding to the size. It can provide FE/RF/AE energy to the block it is attached to. Each MW of power produces 80FE/t, but there is a 10% loss. (The power conversion efficiency and the loss can be adjusted in the configuration file)
